descriptionHtml:
Sword of Omens / Thundercats 2011

As a fan from Thundercats IÂ´ve modelled a sword several months ago.

Here it is....
This is my first mod for Skyrim.

The sword can only be crafted - therefore you will be need the
"Eye of Thundera". Please check the Screenshot for the destination.

Install:
Just coppy the data folder into your skyrim folder
No files will be overwritten.
- Option between English and German


Model and textures are created in Blender.

Hope you enjoy it.

Changelog 0.91a:
- correct texture for the Eye of Thundera
- added a SCB
- name correction
author: JabertNac
